title: 8-6  Conversions between feet and meters
description:
Write a header file that contains the following three functions:
/* Converts form feet to meters */
double footToMeter(double foot)

/* Converts from meters to feet */
double meterToFoot(double meter)

/* Display the table */
void display()

The formula for the conversion is
meter = 0.305 * foot

Function display() displays the table as the sample output. You should set the width of print field of each column to 12, set the precision of floating-point numbers to 3 and fixed, justify the output to the right.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: You should submit the implementation of the function but do not submit the main() function.
